item.description:
This is the 2nd Annual Coach A 5k. Race Proceeds benefit kids education.

Powdermill School is on RT 57 in Southwick, MA

Sign in starts at 7a. Run/walk starts at 9a

Entry fee is $22. Shirts to all entered before 8/25

 

This is a timed course and there is food, music and this weird thing called fun. :)

Oh and did I mention it is mostly a flat course!

There will be a special tribute for the 10 year anniversary of 9/11 and special guest singer Gary Jones. Not sure who that is...but in any case, it benefits the school, so I'm doing it again.

Preregistration by mail. Checks made payable to The Coach A 5K. They can be mailed to Lee Haseltine at 11 Salem Rd, Southwick, MA 01077. He can be reached at 413-569-0939 or via email at leehaseltine@yahoo.com.

 

Hope to see you there.

Erin
item.how_to_find_us: meet outside the school-registration is in the school.
item.name: 2nd Annual Coach A 5K
